title: UK PM Promises 11,000 Jobs for India: Tech Mahindra, Byju's, Other Companies to Hire - News18
content: UK PM Promises 11,000 Jobs for India: Tech Mahindra, Byju's, Other Companies to Hire  News18
description: Tech Mahindra Plans to bolster AI growth, with the aim to create 1,000 jobs in the UK, the British High Commission has said in a statement
